newsitem.title: USA: U.S. jet fuel prices ease with NYMEX, stable diffs.
newsitem.headline: U.S. jet fuel prices ease with NYMEX, stable diffs.

text.p: U.S. spot jet fuel prices slipped about a half cent a gallon on Thursday tracking August NYMEX losses and stable differentials, players said.
U.S. Gulf Coast 54-grade material was pegged between 0.15 cent under the August print and 0.15 cent over, with low sulfur 55-grade offered at about a half cent over the screen, traders said.

Prompt New York Harbor 54-grade remained on offer at about 2.0 cents over August NYMEX. Any-month barrels exchanged hands for 2.75 cents over the screen, a tad weaker than Wednesday differentials, players said.
